name.baseName: Soil remediation ; Ex-situ remediation ; Chemical oxidation ; Construction preparation ; Material transportation
土壤修复;异位修复;化学氧化;施工准备;材料运输

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Site 29,437.9 m3 Total 1,186 tons of materials and chemicals required for remediation of contaminated soil, with a total transport distance of 15 km
场地29437.9 m3 污染土壤修复所需材料和药剂共计1186吨，总运输距离15公里

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: 安徽省合肥市受重金属和有机物复合污染的钢铁厂地块

technology.technologicalApplicability: The data set represents the process of ex-situ soil remediation specifically through chemical oxidation. This process is intended for use in the remediation of industrial sites contaminated with heavy metals and organic pollutants. In this case, the data relates to a steel plant site in Hefei, Anhui province, and reflects the treatment of 29,437.9 cubic meters of contaminated soil, which includes the preparation for construction and the transportation of 1,186 tons of materials and chemicals required for the remediation process over a distance of 15 km.
该数据集代表了通过化学氧化进行的异位土壤修复工艺。该过程专门用于重金属和有机污染物污染的工业场地的修复。本案例针对安徽省合肥市的一个钢铁厂地块，并反映了29,437.9立方米受污染土壤的处理，其中包括为修复过程准备施工和运输距离15公里的1186吨材料和化学药剂。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 桑春晖,杨欣桐,李香兰等.基于SEFA方法的异位土壤修复环境足迹分析——以某钢铁厂为例[J].中国环境科学,2023,43(10):
桑春晖,杨欣桐,李香兰等.基于SEFA方法的异位土壤修复环境足迹分析——以某钢铁厂为例[J].中国环境科学,2023,43(10):

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: Users of this data set should take into account that the provided information is specific to the site mentioned (steel plant in Hefei, Anhui province) and may not be directly applicable to other contexts without adjustments. Factors such as local soil composition, the specific contaminants present, and site conditions should be considered when adapting this process to other locations. Attention should be given to the material and chemical requirements, transport distances, and project scale which may vary significantly for other sites. The recycling or disposal of any residual materials after the remediation process should also be considered in the overall life cycle assessment.
使用此数据集的用户应考虑到所提供的信息是特定于所提及的场地（安徽省合肥市的钢铁厂），且在没有调整的情况下可能不直接适用于其他环境。在将此过程适应到其他地点时，应考虑当地土壤组成、具体存在的污染物以及场地条件等因素。还应注意材料和化学品需求、运输距离以及项目规模可能会有显著变化。在整个生命周期评估中，还应考虑修复过程后任何残余材料的回收或处理。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
